channel.title: Chapter 08: Neural Networks on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 08: Neural Networks on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 08.00: Neural Networks: In a Nutshell
item.description: In this nutshell chunk, we learn about neural networks, the driving force behind many of today’s cutting-edge machine learning applications.

item.title: Chapter 08.01: Introduction
item.description: In this section, we introduces the relationship of DL and ML, give basic intro about feature learning, and discuss the use-cases and data types for DL methods.

item.title: Chapter 08.02: Single Neuron
item.description: In this section we explain the graphical representation of a single neuron and describe affine transformations and non-linear activation functions. Moreover, we talk about the hypothesis spaces of a single neuron and name some typical loss functions.

item.title: Chapter 08.03: Single Hidden Layer NN
item.description: We introduce architecture of single hidden layer neural networks and discuss the advantage of hidden layers. Then, we explain the typical (non-linear) activation functions.

item.title: Chapter 08.04: Single Hidden Layer Networks for Multi-Class Classification
item.description: In this section, we discuss a neural network architectures for multi-class classification, softmax activation function as well as the Softmax loss.

item.title: Chapter 08.05: MLP: Multi-Layer Feedforward Neural Networks
item.description: Architectures of deep neural networks and deep neural networks as chained functions are the learning goal of this part.

item.title: Extra: Basic Backpropagation 1
item.description: This section introduces forward and backward passes, chain rule, and the details of backprop in deep learning.
